title: The Best-est Party Looks From New York Fashion Week
text:
Photo: Getty Images/BFA/Dan Nilsen

New York Fashion Week has reached a joyous conclusion, but Marc Jacobs wasn’t the only one bringing upbeat looks. Shall we compare Gigi Hadid to a summer’s day? When she wears an outfit that looks like green grass and blue skies, we shall. Indya Moore looked fantastic in a pleated skirt, matching blazer, tie, but no shirt. Daring. And Jameela Jamil joined in on the Giant Pink Dress trend. Who wore the best look? Scroll down to find out.

Best Casual Suit: Antoni Porowski; Most Picnic-Appropriate Attire: Gigi Hadid

Photo: Ilya S. Savenok/Getty Images for Saks Fifth Avenue

At Antoni Porowski celebrates the launch of his debut cookbook, Antoni in the Kitchen, at Le Chalet at L’Avenue at Saks.

Best Canadian Tuxedo: Delilah Belle Hamlin

Photo: Mike Vitelli

At the Jordache SP20 presentation at Ray’s bar.

Best Alice in Wonderland Cosplay: Patricia Fox

Photo: BFA

At The New York Times celebrates Bill Cunningham: On the Street Five Decades of Iconic Photography at Bergdorf Goodman.

Best Color Story: Paloma Elsesser and Ashley Graham

Photo: Samantha Deitch/BFA.com

At The Business of Fashion and Nordstrom host an intimate NYFW dinner.

Best Collar: Flaviana Matata

Photo: Matteo Prandoni/BFA.com

At Wes Gordon hosts a celebration of Carolina Herrera’s flagship store reopening during New York Fashion Week.

Best Spin on the School Uniform: Indya Moore

Photo: Dan Nilsen for Cathédrale at Moxy East Village

At the Tao Group celebrates the grand opening of Cathédrale at Moxy East Village.

Best Leotard: Dani Miller

Photo: Hagop Kalaidjian/BFA.com

At Gucci and Saks Fifth Avenue host private event to celebrate in-store installations.

Best Mixed Prints: Nesta Cooper

Photo: Jenna Burke

At Prabal Gurung’s ten-year anniversary dinner, with cocktails by The Glenlivet.

Chillest Stripes: Angela Dimayuga; Best Neon: Lindsay Peoples Wagner

Photo: Angela Pham/BFA.com

At The Standard and Lindsay Peoples Wagner celebrate diversity in fashion.

Best Giant Pink Dress: Jameela Jamil

Photo: Ben Gabbe/Getty Images for YSL Beauty

At the YSL Beauty LIBRE Launch.

Most Likely to Join a ’90s Boy Band: Karreuche Tran

Photo: Taylor Hill/WireImage

At the party celebrating the 30th anniversary of DKNY at St. Ann’s Warehouse.

Best Statement Sleeve: Haidee Findlay Levin

Photo: Paul Evan

At Kirna Zabête celebrates its 20th anniversary.

Best Pose: Coco Rocha

Photo: Madison Mcgaw/BFA.com

At UNIQLO’s FW19 Preview + LifeWear Magazine Launch

Best Glamour Shot Vibes: Samuel Krost

Photo: Sidra Greene Photography

At the Krost x Recess Back to School event.
description: The best party looks from the end of New York Fashion Week, including Indya Moore, Jameela Jamil, and Gigi Hadid.
